com.alvermont.terraj.fracplanet.geom
Class TriangleMeshFlat

java.lang.Object
  com.alvermont.terraj.fracplanet.geom.AbstractTriangleMesh
      com.alvermont.terraj.fracplanet.geom.TriangleMeshCloud
          com.alvermont.terraj.fracplanet.geom.TriangleMeshFlat

public class TriangleMeshFlat
extends TriangleMeshCloud

A mesh representing a flat terrain. Note flat refers to the geometry in use. Obviously the terrain itself isn't entirely flat!

Version:

Creates a new instance of TriangleMeshFlat

Parameters:
ttype - The type of terrain to be generated (triangle, square, hexagon)
z - The Z distance of the terrain from the origin
utils - The math object with the seeded random number generator
progress - The progress object to be used
geometry - The geometry object to be used
